ELEMENT.CREATOR: STAFF
ELEMENT.TITLE: Image Cart with checkout prompts
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout features a single column image based cart with a text block, a product list header and a product list.

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Display coupon entry form in cart

ELEMENT.HTML:
<% /* outputs the google button inside a div. By default, the sitebutton outputs if it is not enabled, so that has to be checked for and also blank (as a redundancy). */ print(""); element(TYPE=>"SITEBUTTON",BUTTON=>"google"); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); format(pretext=>"
",posttext=>"
"); print(); :NOOUTPUT(); %>

<% /* outputs the paypal button inside a div. By default, the sitebutton outputs if it is not enabled, so that has to be checked for and also blank (as a redundancy). */ print(""); element(TYPE=>"SITEBUTTON",BUTTON=>"paypal"); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); format(pretext=>"
",posttext=>"
"); print(); :NOOUTPUT(); %>

<% /* outputs the amazon button inside a div. By default, the sitebutton outputs if it is not enabled, so that has to be checked for and also blank (as a redundancy). */ print(""); element(TYPE=>"SITEBUTTON",BUTTON=>"amzpay"); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); goto(label=>"NOOUTPUT",eq=>""); format(pretext=>"
",posttext=>"
"); print(); :NOOUTPUT(); %>

<% load($FORM); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($UPDATECART_BUTTON); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($EMPTYCART_BUTTON); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($CONTINUE_BUTTON); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($ADDTOSITE_BUTTON); default(""); print(); %>
<% print(""); stop(unless=>$BUYSAFE_ENABLED); print("<td class='ztable_row_head' align='right'>Bonding"); print($BOND_STATUS); print("</td>"); %> <% print(""); stop(unless=>$BUYSAFE_ENABLED); print("<td valign='top' class='ztable_row ztable_row0' align='right'>"); print($BOND_STATUS); print("</td>"); %>
Item Description Quantity Price Item Subtotal
<% loadurp("CSS::ztable_row0.bgcolor"); default("FFFFFF"); set($BGCOLOR=>$_); load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default(""); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"70",h=>"70",bg=>$BGCOLOR,tag=>"1"); print(); %>
<% load($prod_name); default(""); strip(length=>"65",breaks=>"1",html=>"1"); print(); %>
sku: <% load($SKU_LINK); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($POGS); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($QTY_INPUT); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($REMOVE_LINK); default(""); print(); %>
 <% load($PRICE); default(""); format(money); print(); %> <% load($EXTENDED); default(""); format(money); print(); %>
<% print(""); /* if enable_promocode is not set to 1, the promotion textbox is not displayed. */ loadurp("profile:zoovy:enable_promocode"); stop(unless=>$_); print(" "); %>
<% load($ZIP_INPUT); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($DESTINATIONBLURB); default(""); print(); %>
 <% load($SURCHARGE_LINE); default(""); print(); %> <% load($TAX_LINE); default(""); print(); %>
Subtotal: <% load($SUBTOTAL); default(""); format(money); print(); %>
Total: <% load($GRANDTOTAL); default(""); format(money); print(); %>
<% load($ENDFORM); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($img); default(""); image(w=>"22",h=>"22",tag=>"1"); stop(unless=>$img); print(); %> <% load($prompt); default(""); print(); %>: <% load($value); default(""); format(replace=>"\n",with=>"
"); print(); %>
State Tax(<% load($TAXRATE); default(""); print(); %>%): <% load($TAXTOTAL); default(""); format(money); print(); %> <% load($SURCHARGE); default(""); print(); %>: <% load($SURCHARGEVALUE); default(""); format(money); print(); %>

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Text that appears just above the new customer checkout button
ELEMENT.DEFAULT: If you have never made a purchase at this web site and have never subscribed to this store's mailing list, please choose this option.

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Text that appears just above the registered customer checkout button
ELEMENT.DEFAULT: If you have made a purchase at this web site or have subscribed to this store's mailing list, please choose this option

ELEMENT.HTML:
<% print("
"); loadurp("page:featured"); default("You may also like"); print(); print("
"); %>
<% load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"75",h=>"75",tag=>"1",alt=>$zoovy:prod_name); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:prod_name); default(""); print(); %>

ELEMENT.PRETEXT: <div class='zborder' style='margin-top:10px; padding-top:10px; border-left:0px; border-right:0px; border-bottom:0px;' class='ztxt' >
